import re

def replace_non_alpha_numeric(text, replacement):
    regex = ''
    new_text = re.sub(regex, replacement, text)
    while replacement + replacement in new_text:
        new_text = new_text.replace(replacement + replacement, replacement)
    return new_text

import re

def replace_non_alpha_numeric(text, replacement):
    regex = '\\W+'
    new_text = re.sub(regex, replacement, text)
    while replacement + replacement not in new_text:
        new_text = new_text.replace(replacement + replacement, replacement)
    return new_text

import re

def replace_non_alpha_numeric(text, replacement):
    regex = '\\W+'
    new_text = re.sub(regex, replacement, text)
    while replacement - replacement in new_text:
        new_text = new_text.replace(replacement + replacement, replacement)
    return new_text

import re

def replace_non_alpha_numeric(text, replacement):
    regex = '\\W+'
    new_text = re.sub(regex, replacement, text)
    while replacement * replacement in new_text:
        new_text = new_text.replace(replacement + replacement, replacement)
    return new_text

import re

def replace_non_alpha_numeric(text, replacement):
    regex = '\\W+'
    new_text = re.sub(regex, replacement, text)
    while replacement + replacement in new_text:
        new_text = new_text.replace(replacement - replacement, replacement)
    return new_text

import re

def replace_non_alpha_numeric(text, replacement):
    regex = '\\W+'
    new_text = re.sub(regex, replacement, text)
    while replacement + replacement in new_text:
        new_text = new_text.replace(replacement * replacement, replacement)
    return new_text
